play.description: Use our tools to simplify your work and focus on the important thing : the game.
play.title: Play

create.description: Create and share new contents to make your campaigns and the other player's campaigns better.
create.title: Create

gather.description: Gather with other players and create groups to go on an adventure !
gather.title: Gather

title.blank: You must enter a title for this campaign
title.short: The title of a campaign must be at least 4 characters long
title.uniq: You have another campaign with this title

errors.accepted: This player is already playing in this campaign
errors.pending: This player is already invited to this campaign

hints.username: Enter a username and press enter

delete.content: Vous ne pourrez plus afficher son contenu
delete.label: Suppression de fichier
delete.title: Supprimer ce fichier ?

chatroom.roll: This command throws one or more dices, adding one or several modifiers to it
chatroom.secret_roll: This command performs exactly the same action, but only you and the game master can see the result.
chatroom.title: You can use the following commands :

tooltips.chat_error: The message could not be sent

upload.confirmation: The file has been uploaded successfully
upload.error: An error has occurred while uploading the file
upload.title: Upload a file

update.unauthorized: You're not allowed to edit this campaign
